name: 妖怪道中記
summary: Yokai Dochuki (妖怪道中記 Yōkai Dōchūki, lit. "Phantom Travel Journal") is Namco's first 16-bit arcade platform game, released in Japan in 1987 and running on the company's then-new System 1 (which was initially known as "System 87") hardware.
